info.title: Lasso X
info.description:
This connector allows you to use the Lasso X API to retrieve information about the People, Companies and Production Units in the Danish CVR Registry. 

Requires an API Key from Lasso X. For more information, visit www.lassox.com

lassoId.description: The lasso id of the company, e.g. CVR-1-34580820
lassoId.title: LassoId

cvr.description: The CVR Number of the company
cvr.title: CVR

unitNumber.description: The unit number of the company
unitNumber.title: Unit number

commerciallyProtected.description: Whether the company is OK to contact for commercial purposes
commerciallyProtected.title: Commercially Protected

publicallyTraded.description: Whether this company is traded on a stock exchange
publicallyTraded.title: Publically Traded

byLawsChanged.description: Date of the latest bylaws change
byLawsChanged.title: Bylaws changed

cityName.description: Name of the city (Can be empty, use 'postalDistrict' as fallback)
cityName.title: City

name.description: The name of the municipality, e.g. ODENSE
name.title: Name

freeText.description: Free text, usually a non-Danish address
freeText.title: Freetext

fullTimeEquivalentCount.description: The full time equivalent count of workers
fullTimeEquivalentCount.title: Full Time Equivalent

interval.description: Interval the count falls into, e.g. 20-49
interval.title: Interval

month.description: The month of the year the data is from
month.title: Month

year.description: The year the data is from
year.title: Year

value.description: The size of the capital
value.title: Value

currency.description: The currency of the capital, e.g. DKK
currency.title: Currency

hasClasses.description: Whether or not owners of this company has different classes of capital
hasClasses.title: Has Classes

isPartial.description: Whether or not the capital amount if partially paid
isPartial.title: Is Partial

optedOut.description: Whether accounting has been opted out of
optedOut.title: Opted Out

day.description: The number of the day of the month, e.g. 1
day.title: Day

month.description: The number of the month of th eyear, e.g. 1
month.title: Month

day.description: The number of the day of the month, e.g. 31
day.title: Day

month.description: The number of the month of theyear, e.g. 12
month.title: Month

hasOwnersUnderFivePercent.description: If the company has registered that they have owner(s) with less than 5%
hasOwnersUnderFivePercent.title: Owners under 5 percent

from.description: The lower limit of the ownership
from.title: From

to.description: The upper limit of the ownership
to.title: To

ownership.description: (OBJECT) Ownership percentages (to and from) for this owner
ownership.title: Ownership percentages

from.description: The lower limit of the voterights
from.title: From

to.description: The upper limit of the voterights
to.title: To

voterights.description: (OBJECT) Voteright percentages (to and from) for this owner
voterights.title: Vote right percentages

lassoId.description: The lasso id of the owner
lassoId.title: Lasso Id

unitNumber.description: The unit number of the owner
unitNumber.title: Unit number

ownership.description: (OBJECT) Information on the ownership of the company
ownership.title: Ownership

couldNotIdentify.description: This company cannot identify true owners
couldNotIdentify.title: Could Not Identify

exempt.description: This company is exempt from reporting true owners
exempt.title: Exempt

lassoId.description: The lasso id of the owner
lassoId.title: Lasso Id

unitNumber.description: The unit number of the owner
unitNumber.title: Unit number

type.description: The type of owner, typically PERSON
type.title: Type

owners.description: A list of true owners of this company
owners.title: Owners

trueOwnership.description: (OBJECT) Information on the true ownership of the company (reelt ejerskab)
trueOwnership.title: True Ownership

lastUpdated.description: Last time the data was updated
lastUpdated.title: Last Updated

lassoId.description: Lasso Id of the Production Unit
lassoId.title: Lasso Id

unitNumber.description: The Unit Number of the Production Unit
unitNumber.title: Unit Number

lifeTime.description: (OBJECT) The life time of this company
lifeTime.title: Lifetime

commerciallyProtected.description: Whether this company is acceptable to contact for commercial purposes
commerciallyProtected.title: Commercially Protected

creationDate.description: Date this Production Unit was created
creationDate.title: Creation Date

cityName.description: Name of the city (Can be empty, use 'postalDistrict' as fallback)
cityName.title: City

name.description: The name of the municipality, e.g. 'ODENSE'
name.title: Name

freeText.description: Free text, usually a non-Danish address
freeText.title: Freetext

fullTimeEquivalentCount.description: The full time equivalent count of workers
fullTimeEquivalentCount.title: Full Time Equivalent

interval.description: Interval the count falls into, e.g. 20-49
interval.title: Interval

month.description: The month of the year the data is from
month.title: Month

year.description: The year the data is from
year.title: Year

lastUpdated.description: Last time the data was updated
lastUpdated.title: Last Updated

get.summary: Get ProductionUnit information from CVR number
get.description: Gets information about Production Units related to a Company.

parameters.name: sameaddress
parameters.description: Same address as Company? Leave empty to retrieve all

period.description: (OBJECT) The period the report is about
period.title: Period

xbrlUrl.description: A link to the XBRL of the report
xbrlUrl.title: XBRL Link

reportYear.description: The year the report is about
reportYear.title: Year

currencies.description: (LIST) A list of currencies used in the report
currencies.title: Currencies
